protective_factors: Strong deterrent factor (children/family): 'I couldn't do that to them.'
Current engagement and compliance with treatment plan (medication increase, light therapy)
Established therapeutic alliance with the provider
risk_factors: Hopelessness and significant guilt ('I'm a failure', 'letting everyone down')
Vegetative symptoms (early morning awakening, weight loss, psychomotor retardation)
Recent loss of functioning (missed three days of work)
clinical_actions: Document the C-SSRS finding: Passive ideation (Wish to be dead/disappear) without intent or plan.
Increase monitoring frequency following the medication dosage adjustment (Sertraline to 100mg).
Safety plan review focused on immediate coping strategies for 3 AM awakenings.
